item.title: There Are No Kings in Rome
item.description: There Are No Kings in Rome # I have been utterly aghast at the discourse in the media over the last two years in regards to Trump.

item.title: Facebook Posts
item.description: Posted to Facebook: # It has recently been brought to my attention that I haven’t really said anything on here in a very, very, very long time and just post polar bear pictures.
